1.0.0.name: wordpress/fp-linkedin-profile
1.0.0.description:
Bring your LinkedIn profiles to your site to help users discover common professional connections. This plugin embed Profile summary card directly on your webpage. The widget options are managable from wordpress admin area. You can assign the profile link and others options.

Plugin Settings

  • Title - textbox (by default it is - LinkedIn Profile, you can use anything.)
  • Profile Name - textbox (Your Name)
  • Profile Link - textbox (Your LinkedIn Profile Link)
  • Show Connections - Options
  • Display Format - Options
  • Only Icons - Options
